dashboard.title: Dashboard

dashboard.aiRecommendations: AI-powered recommendations based on current conditions
dashboard.higherValuesMean: Higher values mean higher chance of rain
dashboard.aiRecommendations: AI-powered recommendations based on current conditions
dashboard.highTempAlert: High temperature detected. Increase irrigation frequency and provide shade for sensitive crops.
dashboard.lowTempAlert: Low temperature. Consider covering sensitive plants and reduce watering.
dashboard.highHumidityAlert: High humidity increases disease risk. Ensure good air circulation and avoid overhead watering.
dashboard.lowHumidityAlert: Low humidity. Increase watering frequency and consider mulching to retain moisture.
dashboard.strongWindsAlert: Strong winds detected. Avoid spraying pesticides and secure any loose structures.
dashboard.highRainAlert: High rain probability this week. Plan irrigation accordingly and harvest if ready.

landing.hero.title: Smart Farming Made Simple
landing.hero.subtitle: AI-powered insights for Kerala's farmers. Track crops, predict weather, manage costs, and boost yields.

landing.features.crop.desc: Track growth stages, detect diseases early, and get personalized recommendations.
landing.features.weather.title: Weather Forecast
landing.features.weather.desc: Accurate 7-day weather predictions tailored to your location and crops.
landing.features.disease.title: Disease Detection
landing.features.disease.desc: Upload photos to identify plant diseases and get treatment recommendations.

landing.features.prices.desc: Real-time crop prices and market trends to maximize your profits.
